mapper.select: select a.ifdrSeq, a.ifdrTitle, a.ifdrDesc, a.ifdrDateTime, a.ifdrDateTimeEdit, a.ifdrOpenNy, a.member_ifmmSeq, b.ifmmSeq, b.ifmmId, b.ifmmName, b.ifmmNickName from diary a left join member b on b.ifmmSeq = a.member_ifmmSeq where 1=1 and a.ifdrOpenNy = 0

select a.ifdrSeq, a.ifdrTitle, a.ifdrDesc, a.ifdrDateTime, a.ifdrDateTimeEdit, a.ifdrOpenNy, a.member_ifmmSeq, b.ifmmSeq, b.ifmmId, b.ifmmName, b.ifmmNickName from diary a left join member b on b.ifmmSeq = a.member_ifmmSeq where 1=1 and ifdrSeq = #{ifdrSeq}
